references: H. Ibstedt, A Few Smarandache Sequences, Smarandache Notions Journal, Vol. 8, No. 1-2-3, 1997, 170-183.
F. Smarandache, "Collected Papers", Vol. II, Tempus Publ. Hse., Bucharest, Romania, 1996.
S. Smarandoiu, Convergence of Smarandache continued fractions, Abstract 96T-11-195, Abstracts Amer. Math. Soc., 17 (No. 4, 1996), 680.
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Consecutive Number Sequences
formula: a(n)=a(n-1)*10^floor(log10(2*n)+1)+2*n, with a(1)=2. [From _Paolo P. Lava_, Jan 21 2009]
maple: P:=proc(i) local a,n; a:=2; print(a); for n from 2 by 1 to i do a:=a*10^floor(evalf((log10(2*n)+1),100))+2*n; print(a); od; end: P(100); [From _Paolo P. Lava_, Jan 21 2009]
author: R. Muller
extensions: More terms from _Harvey P. Dale_, Mar 24 2013
